articles.author: JAKE COYLE AP Film Writer
articles.title: Ivan Passer, a leading Czech New Wave filmmaker, dies at 86
articles.description: A leading filmmaker of the Czech New Wave movement who fled Soviet-controlled Prague and forged a celebrated career in Hollywood has died
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- 
Ivan Passer, a leading filmmaker of the Czech New Wave who with Milos Forman fled Soviet-controlled Prague and forged a celebrated career in Hollywood, has died. He was 86. 
Passer died Thursday in Reno, Nevada, said a friend of the family, Ami… [+3061 chars]

articles.title: Baltimore private school: Teacher abused students in '90s
articles.description: A private school in Baltimore says a former teacher and coach sexually abused students at his home in the 1990s
articles.content:
BALTIMORE -- 
A private school in Baltimore has acknowledged that a former teacher and coach sexually abused students in the 1990s and the academy could have done more to determine if others had been harmed.

articles.title: Warrant: Mom left infant who drowned in tub for 'me time'

articles.title: Man with hammer shot by deputy in Alabama identified
articles.description: Authorities in Alabama have identified a man who was wielding a hammer before he was fatally shot by a deputy
articles.content:
SEMMES, Ala. -- 
A hammer-wielding man who was shot and killed by a deputy outside a Walmart store in Alabama has been identified.
